entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
